description:
Lin is taken to a land beyond the Sea of Dead, "The Land of the Asura." In this land where might determines everything, there exists a style called the North Star Lapis Lazuli Fist. Kenshiro, crossing the sea in a pirate ship, learns that the ship`s captain, the one-eyed, one-armed, one-legged Akashachi, once raided the Land of Asura, but was forced to flee and left his son behind. Upon arriving at the Land of the Asura, the first thing he sees is Falco, collapsed and gravely wounded by an Asura.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hateshinaki Shiren! Kenshirou Umi o Wataru!
The Ordeal Never Ends! Kenshiro Crosses the Ocean!!
À l`épreuve de la mort ! Kenshiro traverse la mer !
果てしなき試練! ケンシロウ海を渡る!
